section.title: Mailing lists
section.para: Communication is handled by Google Groups tools. It offers a regular mailing list as well as archive management. Since EXPath has been accepted as a W3C group, the main mailing list for everything related to the specifications is the CG mailing list, whilst everything else (including specific implementations, tools, etc.) is discussed on the general list.

primary.title: W3C list
primary.para: The list for all discussions about EXPath specifications. You can visit the list page or send an email to public-expath-request@w3.org" with the subject subscribe in orders to subscribe. Post emails to public-expath@w3.org. All conversations are public, and the private mailing list, created for each and every W3C group, is not used.

primary.title: General list
primary.para: The list for all discussions about EXPath, except the specifications themselves (for those, please use the W3C list instead). You can visit the list Google Groups page or send an email to expath+subscribe@googlegroups.com to subscribe. Post emails to expath@googlegroups.com.

primary.title: Announces list
primary.para: This list is very low traffic and only the team can post messages to this list. You can visit the list Google Groups page or send an email to expath-announces+subscribe@googlegroups.com to subscribe.
